original_text: Again I looked up and I saw four chariots! They came out from between two mountains and the mountains were mountains of shining metal!
korean_text: 내가 또 눈을 들어 본즉 네 병거가 두 산 사이에서 나오는데 그 산은 구리 산이더라

sentences.original_text: They came out from between two mountains
and the mountains were mountains of shining metal!
